item.description:
http://www.foliagetra...

To the Winnipesaukee Railroad in Meredith, NH
154 Main St., Meredith, NH 03254

From The South:

North on I-93 to exit 23. Go right onto Rte. 104 and travel East for 9 miles. Take left on Route 3. About a 1/4 mile you go over a bridge with railroad tracks beneath. Take the next left. Driving time from Boston about 2 hours.

From The North:

South on I-93 to exit 23. Left off the exit onto Rte. 104 and travel East for 9 miles. Take left on Route 3. About a 1/4 mile you go over a bridge with railroad tracks beneath. Take the next left. Driving time from Montreal about 3 hours
item.name: Fall Foliage Outing - New Hampshire
